ChangeList.Description: Added the [changeNotification](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/changenotification?view=graph-rest-beta), [changeNotificationCollection](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/changenotificationcollection?view=graph-rest-beta), and [changeNotificationEncryptedContent](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/changenotificationencryptedcontent?view=graph-rest-beta) resources for the [change notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/concepts/webhooks) API.
Added support for [subscription](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/subscription) in [Microsoft Cloud for US Government](deployments.md).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: chatMessage,Set up change notifications for chat messages, including message properties (preview)
ChangeList.Description: Added support for subscribing to notifications that include resource data. Currently supported resources are [chatMessage](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-beta) resources in Microsoft Teams channels and chats. Subscribing apps will have to implement additional authorization and decryption code to benefit from this feature. For more details, see [Set up change notifications for chat messages, including message properties (preview)](webhooks-with-resource-data.md).
ChangeList.Target: chatMessage,Set up change notifications for chat messages, including message properties (preview)

ChangeList.Description: Added the [Create and send notifications](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/user-post-notifications?view=graph-rest-beta) API to enable targeting users without managing the on-behalf-of tokens.

Introduced the **targetPolicy** property on the [notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/projectrome-notification?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to enable web endpoints to be targeted via webpush.

Added the **fallbackPolicy** property on the [notification](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/projectrome-notification?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to enable guaranteed delivery on iOS for high-priority notifications.

Added two types of lifecycle notifications, **subscriptionRemoved** and **missed**, available for Outlook resources. Subscribing apps can take appropriate actions to mitigate notification interruptions. For more details, see [Reduce missing subscriptions and notifications for Outlook resources (preview)](webhooks-outlook-authz.md).
ChangeList.Target: Reduce missing subscriptions and notifications for Outlook resources (preview)
